name: Help, Valentine Is Here!
description:
Hi,

not everybody loves valentine and this game is just about defending yourself against falling in love. Try it out, hope you enjoy yourself ;)

  • W/S/A/D + mouse movement
  • Gather 3x golden hearth
  • Don't die ;)

CHANGELOG

  • 2019-23-02 Fixed bug, where the game couldn't be restarted
  • 2019-23-02 Added WebBuild
